title: Irrational Fun: Find Yourself at Berlin Buzzwords
description:
We were counting down the days until Berlin
Buzzwords on May 25, when we realised that it
would be great if you came too! With that in mind…

title: Turbo Prop Released
description:
After about a month of hard work I’m proud to announce that my first ever game has been published to the popular mobile app stores. Turbo Prop was created with Unity3D 4.3 and is compatible with Windows Phone, Android, iOS, BlackBerry, and Amazon devices.

The post Turbo Prop Released appeared first on The Polyglot Developer.
